infotexts.entitydescription.blahajaltar: Artifices manifestations of the hajes true power
infotexts.entitydescription.blahajplus: Thrice the size and extra accepting of all identities. Make sure to wear head protection during Blahaj fights.
infotexts.entitydescription.blahajplusplus: Some describe the sensation of getting hit by this as cuddling with a hydraulic press.
infotexts.entitydescription.blahajarmor: Provides additional damage resistance and effects based on its contents
infotexts.entitydescription.bpposter_blahaj1: Magnificent Blahaj Poster perk: Damage resistance Armor perk: Damage resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.bpposter_blahaj2: Eepy Blahaj Poster perk: Speed buff Armor perk: Speed buff
infotexts.entitydescription.bpposter_blahaj3: Friend of Blahaj Poster perk: Regeneration Armor perk: Regeneration
infotexts.entitydescription.bpposter_superblahaj: Handsome Blahaj Poster perk: All of them Armor perk: All of them
infotexts.entitydescription.bpposter_trans: Poster perk: Skill boost Armor perk: Skill boost
infotexts.entitydescription.blahajrifle: Sometimes attack is the best defense.
infotexts.entitydescription.blahajriflemagazine: It's shaped like a fin! How silly!
infotexts.entitydescription.sharkmask: Provides ram ventilation to the wearer.
infotexts.entitydescription.sharkscooter: This aquadynamic underwater scooter provides increased speed when compared to standard issue.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.blahajspeed: Blahaj is helping you get where you want to be.
infotexts.jobdescription.swedic: You're not quite sure how someone this obsessed could be deemed a good fit for manning a nuclear submarine, but here they are, and the captain is letting them stay. For now.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_supplyanddemand: Gain a [probability]% chance to find blue sharks on monsters.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_restock: Gain a blue shark every time you end a round after having finished a mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_ramventilation: Moving while submerged cures oxygen low.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_advancedcuddles: Chance of serious injuries is reduced by up to 70% based on Blahaj Power.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_blahajpower: Unlock Blahaj Power, that increases movement speed and scales with how many Blahajes you have in your inventory.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_heattacc: Blahaj power provides increased melee damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_gotbacc: Blahaj power lets you shrug off a couple bullets every now and then.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_posterascension: Unlock Poster Perks, causing posters to have effects on nearby crew.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_neonpaint: Doubles the range of poster perks.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_gimmickbridge: The strength of poster perks is affected by blahaj power.
infotexts.talentdescription.ntbp_freehandouts: Posters in your inventory increase blahaj power.
